alert.note: Alert for East Cameron; Lower Iberia; Lower St. Martin; Lower St. Mary; Lower Vermilion; Upper St. Mary (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 15 at 9:55PM CST until January 16 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST TUESDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, freezing rain. Additional ice accumulations of a light glaze. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 8 above zero. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southwest Louisiana. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 AM CST Tuesday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 11 AM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Call 511 for road information.

area.areaDesc: East Cameron; Lower Iberia; Lower St. Martin; Lower St. Mary; Lower Vermilion; Upper St. Mary
